verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O happy day that fixed my choice On Thee, my Savior and my God! Well may this glowing heart rejoice, And tell its raptures all abroad.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Happy day, happy day, When Jesus washed my sins away! He taught me how to watch and pray, And live rejoicing every day; Happy day, happy day, When Jesus washed my sins away!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O happy bond, that seals my vows To him who merits all my love! Let cheerful anthems fill His house, While to that sacred shrine I move.
